entry.title: New paper on ant routing
entry.summary: Gabriel Lehéricy has announced a new paper on the ant routing algorithm for the lightning network. The paper provides an estimate for the scalability of the ant routing algorithm and is available online at https://arxiv.org/abs/2002.01374. Gabriel invites any questions regarding their work, which can be answered via email. Gabriel Lehéricy is an Enseignant Chercheur in the Département Ingénierie Financière.
